subSections.title: Translingual
subSections.text: {{ja-forms|勇|勇|勇}} <!-- All three characters are unique. If you have different region-specific fonts installed the characters displayed will be different -->

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Note that in Japanese and Korean, the character is written [[龴]]+[[田]]+[[力]], as found in the [[Kangxi]] dictionary. In traditional Chinese (Hong Kong and Taiwan) and Vietnamese script, the character is written [[龴]]+[[用]]+[[力]]. In modern simplified Chinese, the character is written similar to the traditional Chinese form but the lower right hook of [[用]] is missing.

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|甬|力|t2=strong|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – brave and strong.
